definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Above the critical point, the second-order phase-transition line between the superfluid and the normal phase is determined.
sentences.chinese: 在三相點溫度以上，超流和正常相之間有二級相變。

sentences.english: The tricritical point in the temperature-polarization plane is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 在溫度和費米子極化的相圖上得到了三相點的位置。

sentences.english: It's a very common thing to get, the triple point from this.
sentences.chinese: 從這裏得到三相點是非常常見的。
